title: Decision Support Indicators (DSIs) and their role in hydrological planning
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 157

Author(s): Johanna Lykke Sörensen, Stephanie Eisner, Jonas Olsson, Stein Beldring, Vanessa S.B. Carvalho, Maria Elenius, Carlos Ruberto Fragoso, Anna Hansen, Trine Jahr Hegdahl, Benedito C. Silva, Michelle S. Reboita, Daniela R.T. Riondet-Costa, Nívea A.D. Pons, Cintia B. Uvo
